Tom,
I got the message and responded, altho I too was challenged by the idea of
paying 5000 yen for  access to a catalog. One wonders if a "bulk rate"
could be worked out. I doubt that the JSSUS would be able to see something
like this as a means of serving their members and helping them to move to
the world stage, but the idea might be worth floating. Alternatively we
could try to beat them down.
Peter






Did anybody else get this message?
I checked it out, 50 bucks is a little stiff for sword porn but I
suggested that they make it deductible from the first purchase...

-t
